title: Fomo Mock Exchange
description: A real time stock exchange for people who just want to mess around with stocks and not use real currency.

title: Attitudes Hair Design
description: An informational website for the business Attitudes Hair Design.

title: Emprise
description: A browser based flight search app that allows a user to select the their origin, destination, start and end date of a trip. Based on the entered inputs the user will see information for the lowest price flights and the current 5 day weather forecast.

title: Half Foods
description: Online grocery store where you can buy items to pickup in store later.

title: Tech Blog
description: Tech blog is a blog where you can sign up and start posting anything you would like other people to see.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather Dashboard is an app where you can search a city of your choice and it will bring up the 5 day forecast, temperature, wind speed, humidity, and UV index.
